channel.title: studio on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in studio on my tech ramblings

item.title: How to build a .NET template and use it within Visual Studio. Part 2: Creating a template package
item.description: This is a 2 part-series post. In part 2 I'll show you how to convert a few .NET apps into .NET templates, package them together in a single NuGet pack and use them as templates within Visual Studio.

item.title: How to build a .NET template and use it within Visual Studio. Part 1: Key concepts
item.description: This is a 2 part-series post. In part 1 I'll be talking about a few key concepts that you should know when creating a .NET template.
